member.summary: A resource loader class for a mod.

member.summary: The asset bundle associated with the mod.

member.name: F:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.ModResourceLoader._gameObjectNamePathMap
member.summary: The game object name path map (maps game object names to their paths in the asset bundle).

member.name: F:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.ModResourceLoader._modName
member.summary: The mod name.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

The game object name path map.
member.exception: Thrown if the asset bundle or game object name/path map are null.

member.name: E:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.ModResourceLoader.GameObjectLoaded
member.summary: Occurs when a game object is loaded.

member.name: M:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.ModResourceLoader.LoadAsset``1(System.String)
member.summary: Loads the asset at the specified path.
member.typeparam: The type of the asset to load.
member.param: The path of the asset to load. (Example: "Assets/Textures/MyTexture.png")
member.returns: The requested asset or null if an asset of the requested type at the specified path could not be found.

member.summary: Loads the asset at the specified path.
member.param: The path of the asset to load. (Example: "Assets/Textures/MyTexture.png")
The type of the asset to load.
member.returns: The requested asset or null if an asset of the requested type at the specified path could not be found.

member.name: M:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.ModResourceLoader.LoadAssetAsync(System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Asynchronously loads the asset at the specified path.
member.param: The path of the asset to load. (Example: "Assets/Textures/MyTexture.png")
The type of the asset to load.
member.returns: The asynchronous request for the asset.

member.name: M:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.ModResourceLoader.LoadAssetAsync``1(System.String)
member.summary: Asynchronously loads the asset at the specified path.
member.typeparam: The type of the asset to load.
member.param: The path of the asset to load. (Example: "Assets/Textures/MyTexture.png")
member.returns: The asynchronous request for the asset.

member.name: M:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.ModResourceLoader.LoadGameObject(System.String)
member.summary: Loads a game object with the specified name from the mod. This is used to load game objects that were manually exported during the creation of the mod. GameObjects are loaded as prefabs, cloned, custom scripts reattached, then the cloned object is returned.
member.param: The name or path of the game object to load.
member.returns: The requested game object or null if it could not be found.

member.name: M:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.ModResourceLoader.LoadGameObjectAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Asynchronously loads a game object with the specified name from the mod. This is used to load game objects that were manually exported during the creation of the mod. GameObjects are loaded as prefabs, cloned, custom scripts reattached, then the cloned object is returned. WARNING: Any assets associated with the asset being loaded will be loaded synchronously!
member.param: The name or path of the game object to load.
member.returns: The asynchronous request for the game object.

member.name: M:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.ModResourceLoader.PostProcessLoadedGameObject(UnityEngine.GameObject)
member.summary: Post processes the loaded game object.
member.returns: The object to return to the requestor.

member.name: M:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.ModResourceLoader.GetGameObjectPath(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the asset bundle path of a game object based on the specified game object name or path.
member.param: The name or path of the game object.
member.returns: The asset bundle path of the requested game object.

member.name: T:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.SteamVisibility
member.summary: An enumeration defining the different types of visibility of mods in the Steam Workshop.

member.name: F:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.SteamVisibility.Public
member.summary: A value indicating that a mod should be publicly visible.

member.name: F:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.SteamVisibility.FriendsOnly
member.summary: A value indicating that a mod should be visible to friends only.

member.name: F:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.SteamVisibility.Private
